channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description:
I‚Äôve updated the code that puts a beer emoji in your terminal prompt on Fridays for Zsh, the default shell for MacOS these days. https://t.co/fszt0svAEy
There‚Äôs a burrito emoji now üåØ, but Wednesday is burrito day for me, not Tuesdays anymore, and I put a lemon üçã in my terminal prompt on Wednesdays, so I‚Äôll have to think about that one. ü§î https://t.co/qxpqE5mJy8
It took until Friday morning to be blatantly wrong about something at work, so I consider this a good week.

Oh hey, Howard Schultz is back as CEO of Starbucks. https://t.co/7YT8s8jhh0
I‚Äôve been following news of him ever since I uploaded a photo I took of him in Vancouver to Wikipedia. https://t.co/BiTJYyYIkr
@Planta The Congressional Auditorium, part of the underground U.S. Capitol Visitor Center. https://t.co/x6R4os3J5a

I‚Äôm going to this because, I don‚Äôt know, I just want to feel like I‚Äôm part of something, and the orange-branded party it still the one that most closely aligns with where I stand. https://t.co/5qdb9N7SRq
This, and I can‚Äôt stress this enough, is my aesthetic. https://t.co/Y2BA0rDSOb

@ReneeStephen I think as long as we‚Äôre honest with ourselves as to what‚Äôs propaganda (it‚Äôs weird to see some Ukraine supporters swallow what comes out of that country as if it were unvarnished truth), I think it‚Äôs OK to take sides, and appreciate what propaganda is high quality and what isn‚Äôt.
@KenBorsuk1 @dailysimpsons https://t.co/ORUOkz6gis
@dailysimpsons https://t.co/ud1K9kKxQx
Aujourd‚Äôhui, nous sommes tous irlandais! ‚òòÔ∏è
‚òòÔ∏èüáÆüá∏ https://t.co/T7xt98C6Xg
It looks like @jimniels loved Readlists, too, and attempted to recreate it. https://t.co/N798jbO6fw
@blogTO That sinkhole is bigger than a lot of downtown Toronto condos, am I right?
https://t.co/Qfv4hswHUe https://t.co/c6ldA8t2n4
The musical act in the film, which isn‚Äôt from Toronto, pronounced Toronto the way musical acts not from Toronto pronounce it. https://t.co/QDJZ4u4NwQ
Check to see whether the brand you owe your allegiance to is doing business in Russia: https://t.co/7ZbWRWGHAS
I‚Äôm not one of the 313 Canadians banned from Russia. I checked the list for my known (and secret) aliases as well, and they‚Äôre not there either.

I almost bought a second non-stick frying pan today, as a backup for when one is in the dishwasher. I realized it was cheaper just to clean the existing one, which is easy, y‚Äôknow, it being a non-stick frying pan and all.
Tonight‚Äôs dinner: one-pan braised Greek chicken, with saucy lemon spinach orzotto, topped with feta cheese. https://t.co/31REmiB9pJ
@MapsintheWild Here‚Äôs a really good article on the map (the cleaner in the photos gives you a really good sense of its size): https://t.co/RUhvpzI1nM
There‚Äôs a whole genre of art that‚Äôs about post-apocalyptic Toronto. https://t.co/REp0LJ7dO8

I don‚Äôt listen to addresses by non-parliamentarians to Canada‚Äôs House of Commons much, so it‚Äôs jarring to hear the Speaker say the name of the MPs he calls on to make a speech.
The Speaker of the UK House of Commons does it as a normal part of business, but it usually only happens in Canada if an MP is expelled from the chamber.

The ‚ÄúOriginal Language‚Äù feed of CPAC‚Äôs coverage of Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy‚Äôs address to Canadian Parliament correctly doesn‚Äôt translate his Ukrainian (and presumably Russian when he speaks it). https://t.co/Oj5JhxhBL3
CPAC‚Äôs ‚ÄúOriginal Language‚Äù feed of its coverage Canadian public and government affairs will be in my forthcoming book, Canada: The Good Parts.
CPAC‚Äôs ‚ÄúOriginal Language‚Äù feed of its Canadian public and government affairs coverage will be in my forthcoming book, Canada: The Good Parts.
@MapsintheWild Do you know about the Challenger Relief Map of British Columbia? https://t.co/pNMlNkwgkZ

@deadsquid Every time I learn of an Ontario town that‚Äôs on a lakefront (and there‚Äôs a lot of them), I add ‚Äú-on-the-Lake‚Äù to the name of it see if it sounds funnier, and for every case (except those that already have it), it does. https://t.co/fZsB8A1GEP
